text: The Hungarian Football Federation (HFF) (; MLSZ) is the governing body of football in Hungary. It organizes the football league and the Hungary national team. It is based in Budapest. The association was founded in 1901. The MLSZ became a member of FIFA in 1907 and UEFA in 1954. title: Hungarian Football Federation
